title: When you sacrifice your ally so that you may live

teleport and rev.... fk

{{champion:96}} passive

I got you bro

Taric controls where he goes

Yeah... But you know that bitch is gonna be salty if I don't...

*NO OFFENCE TO KALISTA MAINS MEANT*

(Not just the fact that my brain derped and I'm covering it up)
